scripts.build:sqlite-otel: echo 'Starting build...' && rm -rf dist/sqlite-otel && mkdir -p dist/sqlite-otel/docs && echo 'Copying original static site to root...' && cp -r sqlite-otel/site/* dist/sqlite-otel/ && echo 'Checking for MkDocs build...' && if [ -d mkdocs-build ]; then cp -r mkdocs-build/* dist/sqlite-otel/docs/ && echo 'MkDocs site copied to /docs/'; else echo 'Warning: mkdocs-build not found, using sqlite-otel/site as fallback' && cp -r sqlite-otel/site/* dist/sqlite-otel/docs/; fi && echo 'Build complete'
scripts.dev: npm run build && npx serve dist
